SPiDApiPostRequest

public SPiDApiPostRequest(java.lang.String path,
                          SPiDRequestListener listener)
Creates a POST API request to SPiD

Parameters:
path - Path for request without api and version, e.g. /user/123
listener - Listener called on completion or failure, can be null
